review.title: “A very mis-managed and partisan bunch especially the top 2 partners”
review.pros: Pros – The firm seems to have the ability to rope in clients; fairly decent design abilities and the firm has developed a good recognition in the DC multi-family market
review.cons: Cons – management is petty; if you are not in the inner group or suck-up to the bosses you have little chance to move up even if you perform better than the already blessed; they will put you under the bus if they have to save their skin
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – try some fairplay and show some respect to the employees
